Menace
[i]Green Knight Progenitor[/i] – Green creature spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Undying Friendship[/i] – Other creatures you control have ward {1}.
[i]Jagen's Pupil[/i] – Whenever Abel, The Panther attacks, if another Knight is attacking, support 1. [i](Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to one other target creature.)[/i]
Partner with Cain, The Bull
